text: isi tarah hum ne aap ko is ummat mein bheja hai jis se pehle bahuth si ummate guzar chuki hai, ke aap unhe hamari taraf se jo wahi aap par utri hai pad kar sunaiye, ye Allah rehmaan ke munkir hai, aap keh dijiye ke mera paalne wala to wahi hai, us ke siva dar haqiqath koi bhi laayeq e ibaadath nahi, osi ke upar mera bharusa hai aur osi ki jaanib mera rujo hai
